data.chText: （住处、社会阶层、职业方面的）流动能力
data.enText: the ability to move easily from one place, social class, or job to another

data.chText: 社会地位 / 区域 / 职业流动性
移动的能力；易于行走的能力
data.enText: the ability to move or travel around easily

data.chText: 电动轮椅使她更便于移动了。
data.enText: An electric wheelchair has given her greater mobility.

simple_means.memory_skill: mob 动 + ility 性质 →〔人〕动起来 → 能动性

means: (住处、社会阶层、职业方面的)流动能力

value.def: You use mobile to describe something large that can be moved easily from place to place.

example.ex: ...special mobile units where men can have their fingerprints taken and donate a specimen of blood.
example.tran: 人们可以取指纹和捐献血样的特设流动点

value.def: If you are mobile, you can move or travel easily from place to place, for example because you are not physically disabled or because you have your own transport.
value.tran: 走动方便的；行动自如的；出行方便的

example.ex: Two cars gave them the freedom and mobility to go their separate ways.
example.tran: 拥有两辆车使他们能自由自在地各自单独行动。

value.def: In a mobile society, people move easily from one job, home, or social class to another.

example.ex: We're a very mobile society, and people move after they get divorced.
example.tran: 我们的社会具有很大的流动性，离婚以后人们就会搬家离开。
流动性大的年轻专业人员

value.tran: (社会)流动性的;(在职业、住所或社会阶层间)自由流动的

example.ex: Prior to the nineteenth century, there were almost no channels of social mobility.
example.tran: 19世纪以前几乎不存在社会流动的渠道。

value.def: If someone has a mobile face, the expression on their face changes quickly as their feelings change.

example.ex: Robyn had the more mobile, more expressive face.
example.tran: 罗宾有一张更加善变、表情更加丰富的脸。

value.def: A mobile is a decoration which you hang from a ceiling. It usually consists of several small objects which move as the air around them moves.
value.tran: (悬挂在天花板上的)风动小饰物

value.def: A mobile is the same as a mobile phone .

trans: 社会流动；社会流动性；性社会变动；社会阶层流动；社会迁移
高流动性；高机动性；高迁移率；快速移动；高移动性
上向流动倾向；向上流动；向上流动性；上向流动能动性；上向流动
流度比；迁移率比；流动比；流动比率；流动率
载流子迁移率；载流子的迁移率；载子迁移率；载体迁移率；载子移动率
工作流动性；工作流动；职业流动性；职业流动

partsOfSpeech.dec: auto 自己 + mob 动 + ile 属于…的 → 自己动的〔车〕→ 汽车
book 书 + mob 动 + ile 表物体 → 动的书 → 流动图书馆
com 加强 + mot 动 + ion 表动作 → 到处都在动 → 动乱
de 非，相反 + mobilize 动员 → 动员〔退伍〕→ 复员
de 向下 + mot 动 + e → 向下动 → 使降级
e 出 + mot 动 + ion 表名词 → 动出〔感情〕→ 感情
im 不 + mobile 活动的，可动的 → 静止的
loco 地方 + mot 动 + ive 表物 → 从一个地方跑到另一个地方的东西 → 火车头
mobb〔= mob〕动 + ish …的 → 乱动的 → 暴乱的
mob 动 + ster 表人 → 匪徒，歹徒
mob 动 + ile 物体 → 活动的，可动的
mob 动 + ility 性质 →〔人〕动起来 → 能动性
mobil〔e〕活动的，可动的 + ize 使… → 使〔人〕动 → 动员
mot 动 + ion 动作或状态 → 运动
mot 动 + ive 表名词 → 动机
motiv〔e〕动机 + ate 使… → 使有动机 → 推动
pro 向前 + mot 动 + e → 向前运动 → 促进
